short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a chrome extension to help you use ChatGPT more efficiently

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the power of ChatGPT like never before with ChatGPT Assistant Pro, the Chrome extension designed to enhance your experience with the powerful language model. With ChatGPT Assistant Pro, you can do many more.

Version: 0.0.14

- Download conversations
- Fixed Conversation show hide and prompt helper elements

Version: 0.0.13

- Navigate through conversations with ease: The right sidebar displays a list of all user inputs, allowing you to quickly jump to specific points in the conversation.
- Customize your view: The left sidebar, right sidebar, and conversation names list can be easily hidden or displayed as needed, giving you the flexibility to focus on what matters most.
- Save time and effort: The scroll-to-top button makes it easy to navigate long conversations, while the dedicated copy button allows you to quickly copy GPT responses without hassle.
- Keep the conversation going: With the "Continue" button, you can seamlessly continue conversations and never miss a beat.
- Streamline your workflow: Select frequently used inputs with the dropdown menu and get faster access to the inputs you need most.
- Turn on or off the extension features
